mapper.update: update plate_code_dmz set c_dmmc = #{cDmmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, c_sort = #{cSort,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, c_bz = #{cBz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, c_zt = #{cZt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, c_cjuser = #{cCjuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, d_cjsj = #{dCjsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, c_xguser = #{cXguser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, d_xgsj = #{dXgsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where c_dm = #{cDm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and c_dmlb = #{cDmlb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select c_dm, c_dmlb, c_dmmc, c_sort, c_bz, c_zt, c_cjuser, d_cjsj, c_xguser, d_xgsj from plate_code_dmz
